result.reason: Feature request to provide granular security controls (likely password protection or encryption) at the folder level within the connection tree.
result.approach: Extend the ConnectionInfo class to support a security/lock state for containers. Implement a password prompt UI mechanism when expanding locked folders in the ConnectionTree. Investigate feasibility of encrypting the subtree in the XML storage vs UI-only locking.
